channel.title: Losing items in pest control?
channel.description: How would I fix it when you lose items in Pest Control? How would I make it safe zone? And how would I make it so you just tele back to the boat when you die?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 09:26:53 pm[/size][hr]Someone please help!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 10:48:50 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Losing items in pest control?
item.dc:creator: @daone8 daone8
item.description:
@daone8 wrote:

Their has to be, I’ve seen it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 11:32:13 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Coder Fatality, post:2, topic:288126”]Most pest controls when you die you cant lose items… You attack portals… They dont fight back! And so There would be no need. If it is a wilderness zone then you would look on Moparscape Search bar ^^^^^^[/quote]Well I fixed mine up a bit, it spawns npc’s now I’m just fixing it up now.

Read full topic

Nevermind I figured out do you know how to make an npc do a certain emote?

item.title: Losing items in pest control?
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Fatality Coder Fatality
item.description:
@Coder_Fatality wrote:

Most pest controls when you die you cant lose items… You attack portals… They dont fight back! And so There would be no need. If it is a wilderness zone then you would look on Moparscape Search bar ^^^^^^

Read full topic
